description.narrative:
Access to Education: Access to quality education is one of World Bank Group's key engagement areas. The current funding will enable ISFC to fund schools to expand their existing facilities and improve their current infrastructure which will impact students across the country.
Competitiveness: The education finance sector is very nascent with only three education infrastructures focused NBFCs in the country. The Affordable Private Schools are severely underfunded and IFC's investment will demonstrate the sustainability of this business model and will be an intervention in a space where most mainstream financiers are reluctant to lend.

The project involves investing up to US$15mn equity and up to US$15mn debt in Indian School Finance Company Pvt Limited (ISFC or the Company), a Non-Banking Finance Company (NBFC) that provides loans to educational institutions. ISFC caters to affordable private schools, colleges, coaching centers, education SMEs and retail loans to teachers. The project supports the growth of Indias affordable private schools which are critical to providing quality education, especially for low income families.
